item.title: Blog is Working!
item.description: After a few nights and many powdered energy drinks later, I have finally managed to get the blog section of this website fully functional! after struggling with my ADHD not being able to get anything done for such a long time, it is such a relief to actually be able to say I’ve acomplished a nice milestone in my tech endeavours thanks to the power of caffeine! if you have access to ADHD medicine it is obviously a much better option.
